website_summaries.verdict: Most versatile TIKI torch. Easily converts for use in yards, on the deck, or on the table.
pros: 4-piece pole easily morphs into 2 sizes for staking in the grass (50” or 64”)
Also works as a tabletop and deck torch
Cap is attached with a chain to make snuffing out flame a breeze
cons: Some reports that the chain that holds the cap is flimsy

customer_reviews.title: Very Disappointed
customer_reviews.text: We ordered 4 of these torches for a BBQ we are having and I just received them today and 3 of the 4 torches were either broken or scratched! It was so disappointing, I have to send them back for a refund, and now need to find torches somewhere else. I was also a bit disappointed in the material I thought they would be a bit harder of a plastic but it is a very soft plastic., soft enough to break into pieces:(
customer_reviews.author: Karalyn

customer_reviews.title: Quantity misrepresented...1 item per package
customer_reviews.text: Picture shows two items but it appears that you only get one. Very deceptive advertising and disappointing on what would otherwise be a good product. 18.99 for a single plastic tiki torch is not a good deal. I purchased quantity 2 expecting to get 4 but only received 2. If you show two units in the picture and that is not what you are intending to ship, you should be pretty clear in your product description that the picture does not match the contents. Disappointing!
customer_reviews.author: Linz-o-matic

customer_reviews.title: Classy looking jars
customer_reviews.text: Looked all over for an alternative to those corny looking bamboo tiki poles,and decided to try these resin jars . These are really good looking,and very well made jars, and instead of using the supplied clamps and pole extensions, we have them directly on the deck . The flame is higher than I expected, and they seem to use quite a bit of oil ( this maybe normal ), but that gives a great "campfire" effect when sat out at night . I am seriously thinking of ordering 2 more units. One tip however, the wick gets extremely coated in black oil residue, so make sure you screw off the cap to refill with care .
customer_reviews.author: GORDON

customer_reviews.title: Great quality for the price.
customer_reviews.text: While I like the versatility of this product I wasn't able to have it burn without so much smoke. I tried all of the suggested tricks with the short wick and it still seemed to be quite smoky. However, when we placed the torch further away from us it does seem to work well. It isn't cheaply made, doesn't look tacky and works just as expected to keep the little bugs away while we are outside. I do like that for the price this is a quality product that does exactly when you might expect.
customer_reviews.author: Vince A.

customer_reviews.title: Thought there was supposed to be two
customer_reviews.text: I love the look of this. But when I ordered I assumed I was getting tow torches? I only got one. I would not have ordered if I had only known that it was one. I could have gotten two for just bad bit more. The torch is good and it looks good but the advertising is mis leading.
customer_reviews.author: Chonda Morin

customer_reviews.title: Clever. Versatile. Great value!
customer_reviews.text: Simple, versatile, easy to use in a variety of locations. Seem like good quality. The pole comes in three parts, so you can have them at different heights, based on ground situation. Or you can store the poles, and simply set the lamps on your table; they're perfectly presentable. Or you can use the clip and attach the lamps to a railing, like around a deck.
customer_reviews.author: Mudlumps

customer_reviews.title: Recommended
customer_reviews.text: Assembly is easy (had two installed in 10 minutes) and they look natural in the landscape.
customer_reviews.author: Dawnsied

customer_reviews.title: The sales image shows 2, but this is only for 1 torch
customer_reviews.text: These are nice bit the listing is deceptive, I realized it before purchasing and still bought it (2 in fact) and that does put a damper on the value. These are quality and easy to assemble. Overall I like them but I did knock a star off because of the deception with it looking like you get 2 when you only really get one. Just my Thoughts, AK
customer_reviews.author: Amadeus B. Klein

customer_reviews.title: It appears in the picture that there are two lamps in this package and there is only one
customer_reviews.text: I am not returning these because the one that I got is in good condition and appears to be a good product. However it is kind of misleading because they have 2 in the photo and it is my guess they know that.
customer_reviews.author: Ginger Wright

customer_reviews.title: and I'm happy with that
customer_reviews.text: Very well constructed from what I can tell. I bought the stone ones to match my pebble bed in the back yard, and I'm happy with that. These do come with clamps if you wish to mount them. But be advised, there are no stakes for driving I to the ground. If you choose not to use a stake, it is recommended that you drive these at least 6" into the ground, which will take off of your final height, leaving me with just under a 5' torch.
customer_reviews.author: Alan

customer_reviews.title: Picture shows 2 torches but only 1 in the package
customer_reviews.text: Yes it's very pretty but it's extremely deceptive advertising. There are 2 torches in the picture but only 1 comes per box. Also, mine was in perfect condition, however, the box is very thin without sufficient padding so I understand why so many arrive broken.
customer_reviews.author: lmclemons1

customer_reviews.title: Buyer Beware!
customer_reviews.text: Not very sturdy, resin is a hard plastic that breaks as soon as it falls over. I have them on my covered patio in the Tiki brand stand holders. As soon as a strong wind or palm fall and push them over they shatter. Not worth the 29.99 a jar, probably go back to metal. Rather them dent then break.
customer_reviews.author: Cheryl Grasso

customer_reviews.title: Poor quality
customer_reviews.text: The product came damaged. Very disappointed in packaging. We have 5 others that all came perfect. Not sure why this bunch was all damaged. Seller??
customer_reviews.author: Trish

customer_reviews.title: Missing Items
customer_reviews.text: I was very disappointed that the deck mount brackets were missing from both boxes. It should have came with the 4-in-1 multi use Tiki Torches as indicated on the instructions
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great Torch!
customer_reviews.text: These are fantastic! I had purchased bamboo torches last year but within a couple months they looked terrible, were moldy and falling apart. I had purchased a couple that are similar to these for another area in our yard and really liked them but were a bit larger than I wanted around the fire pit. I found these and they are the perfect size! They cost a little more than the bamboo ones but if you have to replace the others every year these pay for themselves by the second year (and it's much less wasteful!).
customer_reviews.author: LeslieLu

customer_reviews.title: Very nice looking and work great!
customer_reviews.text: LOVE it! I ordered 4 of these. One of them had an issue with the clamp but I called the manufactures number in the box. They asked me to email them a picture of the damaged piece and a copy of my receipt. They shipped me out a replacement part and I got it within the week. They seem to be well made. I even ordered them as a housewarming gift for a friend. They love them too!!
customer_reviews.author: RaeMaleeW

customer_reviews.title: Nice ceramic  torches
customer_reviews.text: We had owned pairs of these for years. They are nice torches. The only real downfall is how thin and week the poles are. They seem to bend fairly easy. But the upper torch part is nice and durable. I suggest just first using some rebar and pounding that into ground first, then slide poles over the bar to give it some additional sturdiness.
customer_reviews.author: Brian

customer_reviews.title: Tiki no longer makes refill canisters for this size Tiki torch
customer_reviews.text: Although these torches work great, Tiki is no longer selling refill canisters. I just got off the line with their customer service. I have purchased the 12oz refill canisters thinking the would fit and they are too tall and do not fit. So I called Tiki directly and they informed me they are no longer carrying refill canisters for this size torch. So if you do purchase this torch don't throw away the canister which you will have to refill or be aware that Tiki does not make refill canisters. Today is 9/5/2018.
customer_reviews.author: Jeffrey Klenk

customer_reviews.title: So much better than anything you can find in the stores and at a good price.
customer_reviews.text: I absolutely love these! The poles don't rust. They are unique and better than anything I could find in the stores. If you need to store them, you can disassemble them and put them in a small box. I will definitely be purchasing more.
customer_reviews.author: michelle patterson

customer_reviews.title: Great product but use caution buying online!
customer_reviews.text: Torches work great, but use caution ordering these online. They are ceramic and of the 6 I ordered from Amazon, 3 came broken and unusable. If you can find them locally though, well worth buying.
customer_reviews.author: Sgt. Dailey

customer_reviews.title: Leaks from the bottom
customer_reviews.text: Left it on the table overnight and it leaked MAJOR. Now I can’t even have it on a patio table. Not extremely pleased with it
customer_reviews.author: Tracey

customer_reviews.title: Tiki lacks basic quality control
customer_reviews.text: Overall a nice item, too bad Tiki doesn't do quality control checks. On my torch, the hole drilled in the table-top mount was too large, so the threads in the tightening bolt had nothing to grab onto. Thus, the mount will not safely mount to the table-top or deck rail (six inch open flame, what could go wrong?).
customer_reviews.author: Joe in Woodinville

customer_reviews.title: Best torches we've bought so far!
customer_reviews.text: These tiki torches are decent quality and held up after being out for one entire season. They are easy to fill and were easy to take down from our deck when it become to cold to sit outside. Looking forward to using them again in the Spring.
customer_reviews.author: Marian R

customer_reviews.title: cant complain, these are very well constructed
customer_reviews.text: after hours of researching what kind of tiki torch would be most suitable for our patio and back yard I finally settled on this one. I couldn't be happier with the construction and the durability. this is a semi heavy resinstone that comes with clamps for the deck or a standing pole for the yard. I combine this with the Firefly citronella and there are no signs of mosquitoes near us.. great product!! Well worth the money!
customer_reviews.author: Theh0rr0rsh0w

customer_reviews.title: Looks good.
customer_reviews.text: The lamp itself is nice. The package isn’t really conducive to being packed loosely in an amazon box and the lawn stake was broken on arrival. We mainly wanted to clamp it but it would have been nice to have the option.
customer_reviews.author: David B

customer_reviews.title: I don't watch tv anymore
customer_reviews.text: These things are just nice.... they're unique, light easily, pleasing to look at, provide moderate low light for those evenings when you don't want boats to run up into you lighthouse because the bulb has burned out and the replacement is too expensive... but I digress... they do what they're supposed to do...and if you use citronella oil, they'll do so much more!
customer_reviews.author: pleco01

customer_reviews.title: Broken Jars
customer_reviews.text: Nice looking, good quality poles and the stone look is very appealing. Installation was a breeze. The jars themselves seemed to be very thin, several of them were broken in the box, others had the chain used to connect the top also broken. Not sure for this price that I should be doing any maintenance whatsoever therefore 3 stars.
customer_reviews.author: BB

customer_reviews.title: Nice looking!
customer_reviews.text: I ordered four (4) of these torches. Love the way the resin jars look (so did the neighbors, as they ordered some, too)! Only down side would be the assembled "pipe". The bottom section really needs to be a closed off stake. It would make insertion into heavy/gravel soil much easier.
customer_reviews.author: Bobbe Jo

customer_reviews.title: Don’t waste your money
customer_reviews.text: This product is not a good purchase. Cheaply made for the price. The plastic /resin lamp was shattered when I received. Also the deck clamp was weak and coming apart bent where it should have been soldered. I am returning. Just a nuisance. Don’t waste your money
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: 4-in-1 is sneaky labeling....
customer_reviews.text: I feel dumb. I saw 4-in-1 and understood that to mean there were four torches. There is in fact only one torch that you can set at one of four different heights. Don't be as dumb as me. Otherwise it's fine, just way more expensive than I thought.
customer_reviews.author: joobz

customer_reviews.title: Love Fire!
customer_reviews.text: We bought the TIKI Torch brand for our villa in Sicily, and passed them down to friends when we moved back to the states. So, with this house we wanted TIKI Torches again..... We love the look, easy to light, but wish they had a lever to slid open/close to fill easier.
customer_reviews.author: N. C. Ariens

customer_reviews.title: Good temporary spot lighting for party.
customer_reviews.text: The torches were easy to assemble. The pleasant surprise, though, was how they burned: no smoke or petroleum odor. We could enjoy the festive light without the headache-inducing fumes of old. I suppose that has to do with the formulation of the newer fuel that is available for purchase now.
customer_reviews.author: MattA

customer_reviews.title: Great torches!
customer_reviews.text: LOVE LOVE LOVE these torches!! They look great. Can be used many different ways. Were easy to put together. And I got them so cheap!!! I'm really pleased. The only MINOR complaint I have is that the chain that is attached to the "snuffer" comes unattached easily. But that is remedied by squeezing it together with a pair of pliers.
customer_reviews.author: osufan

customer_reviews.title: Broken tiki lantern
customer_reviews.text: Could not assemble due to a large hole in the side of the tiki container. Must return item.
customer_reviews.author: BGM

customer_reviews.title: I can't believe I found these.
customer_reviews.text: I already had three of these that I bought years ago. I was surprised to find them again to add to my collection.
customer_reviews.author: Paula Koenig

customer_reviews.title: Pretty and fun!
customer_reviews.text: We love these! We ordered six and lined our master bedroom deck with all six. I like them because you can use them as stakes or you can mount them to your deck without the stakes. They are pretty and very inexpensive. They are a great value!
customer_reviews.author: 40FAB

customer_reviews.title: Look Good
customer_reviews.text: Very easy to put together and it's a nice looking torch. Seems like it should last a few years. Recommended.
customer_reviews.author: GDF26

customer_reviews.title: Love these. They are adorable and sturdy
customer_reviews.text: Love these. They are adorable and sturdy. Especially for the excellent price. Ordering more now. I have them lined up on an angle on my deck and they look amazing.
customer_reviews.author: Laurie White

customer_reviews.title: Good product
customer_reviews.text: So far seems to work well, not quite as sturdy as I would want but it’s good for the price.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: The clamps are crap and fall off easily
customer_reviews.text: Container is attractive. Poles are segmented to allow for different heights. The clamps are crap and fall off easily. I threw them away and used zip ties. This model used the standard tiki bottle inserts. That's nice when you need to replace them.
customer_reviews.author: Mark H.

customer_reviews.title: Misleading picture of Tiki torches!
customer_reviews.text: Not happy to find out you only get one per order! The picture makes it look like you are getting 2 I ordered 2 thinking I was getting 4 so why don't you say somewhere that each order includes 1 not 2 as shown!
customer_reviews.author: Terry falck

customer_reviews.title: Make sure it’s deep in the ground so the wind doesn’t blow it over
customer_reviews.text: I didn’t like the fact when the wind blew it over it broke but I love how it looks.
customer_reviews.author: Jan

customer_reviews.title: Love these!
customer_reviews.text: We have these all around our back yard and they create a very nice back drop for our pool at night.
customer_reviews.author: sunny_skys

customer_reviews.title: Deceived by the display.
customer_reviews.text: The display indicates that the torches come in pairs. But they are actually individually. And now, they are no longer available so I can’t order a second one. Very aggravating!!
customer_reviews.author: C Michael Blakely

customer_reviews.title: You wont regret this purchase!
customer_reviews.text: Beautiful accent to my outdoor area. I'm using it as a table top tiki and I get tons of compliments on it! Works great, easy to fill and use. Great size too! The flame is really large (which I like). I use plain paraffin oil because I have a screen around my patio, so I don't have to worry about mosquitos. Burns clean and beautifully. Lights up the entire patio (which is only about 16'x8').
customer_reviews.author: no_deadbeats

customer_reviews.title: Great Product
customer_reviews.text: Product was just like it was mentioned and received it quickly.
customer_reviews.author: Jefferson A. Daniel

customer_reviews.title: the torch fitted well with outside decor
customer_reviews.text: this was a gift and the recipient was pleased with it.
customer_reviews.author: Tealover

customer_reviews.title: It still looks nice, but the color is definitely darker
customer_reviews.text: The color of the torch does not match the image. It still looks nice, but the color is definitely darker. Also the box that these come in is bright blue which rubbed off on the torch.
customer_reviews.author: Kristi

customer_reviews.title: Slightly upscale, more versatile Tiki
customer_reviews.text: What can you say? It's a juiced-up tiki torch with a variety of shaft length and mounting options. Exterior of the fuel can compartment looks (almost) like a natural material, and is surprisingly attractive. Way better and more versatile than the one-piece wicker version at the local big box store.
customer_reviews.author: Borisgoodenough

customer_reviews.title: STUNNING !!!
customer_reviews.text: These lamps were the finishing touch to a paver stone circular patio. It dressed off the project beautifully. It gave the whole project the look of genuine class. They provide a unique look that the usual black wrought iron just doesn't deliver. STUNNING!!!
customer_reviews.author: Steven McDonald

customer_reviews.title: Misleading!
customer_reviews.text: While other torches are sold in a two pack, this one is not.
customer_reviews.author: A. Crow

customer_reviews.text: Great however can’t get the wicks to light?? They’ve been soaking and crap!!’
customer_reviews.author: Angie Novak

customer_reviews.title: Worth every cent plus more
customer_reviews.text: Wish they would let me buy more then 4 ,
customer_reviews.author: juvenal

customer_reviews.title: Nicely made and adjustable
customer_reviews.text: Nicely made and includes a sectioned metal pole so the height can be adjusted. It looks like this will last much longer and look better than the bamboo tiki lamp holders.
customer_reviews.author: superdataman

customer_reviews.title: Love these lamps
customer_reviews.text: They look great clipped to our deck, provide good light and definitely keep the bugs at bay. My only slight negative is they seem to get through a lot of lamp oil. I haven't used other oil lamps in the garden so it may be a standard thing but they definitely get through more oil than I was expecting.
customer_reviews.author: Caroline Black

customer_reviews.title: Summer 2017 I'm ready for you
customer_reviews.text: held up to our crazy prarie winds and kept the bugs away for our short outdoor season this year. I really look forward to having them from the beginning of outside time next year. I was truly afraid they posts would not withstand our winds but they did.
customer_reviews.author: Y. Cowlishaw

customer_reviews.title: Very warm!
customer_reviews.text: Very nice on my front and back porch. Price was reasonable and I received it at the right time.
customer_reviews.author: The Armour Family

customer_reviews.title: I love this "jar"
customer_reviews.text: I love this "jar". I've had these jars for over six years. They work great. I had to replace one of the jars as it broke during a bad storm. I looked everywhere for a replacement and was unable to find a single replacement. I would have to buy a set of four. Amazon was able to sell me a single jar. Thanks Amazon.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: but not super bad. The lid screws on a fuel can ...
customer_reviews.text: Body looks a little platicish, but not super bad. The lid screws on a fuel can and that whole combination you just put into the container - but it's not screwed in. On the bottom the container has 3 little holes for water drainage. The chain for the cap is tied to the pole and unfortunately not to the container.
customer_reviews.author: dee.lite

customer_reviews.title: Buy this
customer_reviews.text: I love this product. There have been a lot of bugs this year. I light this candle within 3 minutes there aren’t any bugs. I can sit by my pool and relax without getting tore up by the bugs. Worth the money.
customer_reviews.author: chris orr

customer_reviews.title: Classic Look with Display Options
customer_reviews.text: Love the versatility! For years we have been purchasing the most inexpensive tiki torches that are available. This year I decided to try something new and I'm so glad that we did! We have some attached to the fence and others staked into the ground. They will be easy to store over the winter and we won't need to buy more tiki torches next year!
customer_reviews.author: SunOnMyHip

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful Torches at a Great Price!
customer_reviews.text: These tiki torches are an amazing deal for the price. I was expecting a cheaper quality, but they are great quality and beautiful! I bought them for our camper, Iloved them so much, I ordered them for our back porch as well!
customer_reviews.author: Sue W.

customer_reviews.title: Great
customer_reviews.text: Great value and quality. Don’t let the price fool you very good quality. Would make a great gift!
customer_reviews.author: william

customer_reviews.title: Best Tiki Torches.
customer_reviews.text: Best Tiki Torches. Look so good, restaurant owners were asking me where they can buy them. I love that you can put them on the table as well as on the post. Only thing is a wish they came with a stake, the poles are tough to get into hard or rocky ground.
customer_reviews.author: Monica DeAngelis

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful. Came with 4
customer_reviews.text: Beautiful. Came with 4, gave 2 to my newly wedded son, wife told him he was allowed to have a hammock, but couldn't afford some good tiki torches. Gave him 2 of mine. So much better than those cheap bamboo. Will definitely buy again if I need them.
customer_reviews.author: brallas

customer_reviews.title: Versatile and attractive
customer_reviews.text: I like the versatility of the length, and it easily attached to my balcony rail.
customer_reviews.author: Halle Scott

customer_reviews.title: Great Torch!  Versatile!
customer_reviews.text: These are adjustable and can be used anywhere. Only thing that kept them from a 5 rating isnthenfact the metal on the clamps is so thin it bends when being tightened to my deck rails. A small bit of engineering would make this a five star review!!
customer_reviews.author: Kevin L Painter Sr.

customer_reviews.title: Good Torch.  Sturdy and looks nice.
customer_reviews.text: Like the look of these touches and they work very well. Good quality!
customer_reviews.author: Russ

customer_reviews.title: great product but the chain that holds the cap on ...
customer_reviews.text: great product but the chain that holds the cap on is so cheap that it breaks right away. One of the two of mine came with a broken chain. I bought 4 last year and the chain broke on most of them before the end of the summer.
customer_reviews.author: jinmaine

customer_reviews.title: Versatile
customer_reviews.text: I have several Tiki torch models, and this one is the best combination of flexibility, strong flame, easy to refill, and the right blend between flame size and fuel life. I'm getting more of these. The more traditional torch shape is, admittedly, more pleasing to the eye, but this little guy works really well on a table top, and is really easy to move around.
customer_reviews.author: Snugs

customer_reviews.title: Difficult to place in ground
customer_reviews.text: Nice, but for the money, it seems the pole could include s stake for easier placement in the ground. Safety issues for kids and animals since it is so hard to mount into dry hard ground. Otherwise, really like these torches and they look great in the yard.
customer_reviews.author: Sana

customer_reviews.title: Nice quality. Very versatile with the different mounting options
customer_reviews.text: Nice quality. Very versatile with the different mounting options. Wish the cap/smother tool was attached to the torch and not the first pole. If you use it an just place on the table, you don't have a cap to smother the flames.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Quality and Style
customer_reviews.text: They feel very heavy-duty and look great on our deck! They were easy to install (we use the clip-on deck set-up). Very happy with these so far!
customer_reviews.author: Katie M.

customer_reviews.title: shorted one
customer_reviews.text: I was supposed to receive 2 of these and only one came. Wondering why?
customer_reviews.author: PAM ARTHUR

customer_reviews.title: Love it!
customer_reviews.text: I love the tiki torches! They are very nice looking and add a touch of class to my patio area.
customer_reviews.author: L. Giles

customer_reviews.title: Nice torches
customer_reviews.text: Have only used them a couple times so far but they seem like they are sturdy and good quality.
customer_reviews.author: samantha

customer_reviews.title: Paid too much for trashy Tiki torches
customer_reviews.text: We want the torches displayed on Amazon, not these which do not match the the picture on the box. The actual torches look too trashy for my patio! We missed the return window by just a few days. False misleading advertising!
customer_reviews.author: Petersbay

customer_reviews.title: Multipurpose and look great.
customer_reviews.text: These look really nice on our deck. Not tacky. Love that the pole is adjustable.
customer_reviews.author: TiredMommy

customer_reviews.title: Good torches, did buy again.
customer_reviews.text: I bought these awhile ago, and bought them again to expand my set to 4. They look good, burn well, and can go in my yard or around the porch. If looking for a product like this, these are solid.
customer_reviews.author: Adam R.

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: THese are great. They really light up the dark areas of our background.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: I am happy with how the torches look but the canister is ...
customer_reviews.text: I am happy with how the torches look but the canister is a plastic resin that breaks easily if dropped or if it falls. The pole doesn't have a pointed stake so it is difficult to secure in the ground. With a little wind, I had 2 fall over and break soon after I purchased them.
customer_reviews.author: jfran

customer_reviews.title: Much better than the cheaper ones I accidentally set on fire
customer_reviews.text: Much better than the cheaper ones I accidentally set on fire! Look great on my patio and I feel safer now
customer_reviews.author: Glamazonian

customer_reviews.title: Great Torches!
customer_reviews.text: Very flexible design. We mounted ours on our deck railing using one of the three sections of pipe and the included deck mounts. Reasonably priced and very attractive. Looks like natural stone.
customer_reviews.author: Daniel J. Kobiljak

customer_reviews.title: Very nice!!!
customer_reviews.text: Look beautiful and work great! I have them stakes in large pool-side planters, but they also come with clamps that allow you to attach them to railings. Nicer than any I've seen in stores.
customer_reviews.author: Laurie

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Love these tiki lights. Sturdy and good quality for the money.
customer_reviews.author: Rochelle

customer_reviews.title: Sleek stone resin design
customer_reviews.text: Resin stone finish looks great surrounding our slate patio and stone house. Easy to fill reservoir.
customer_reviews.author: JC

customer_reviews.title: They are holding up pretty well. Keep a look out for the chain ...
customer_reviews.text: I've had these torches for a few years. They are holding up pretty well. Keep a look out for the chain that attaches the the top (that puts out the flame). The chain isn't the best quality, and I have lost a top or 2.
customer_reviews.author: LeShane L

customer_reviews.title: NICE TORCH---NOT CHEAPO
customer_reviews.text: Nice heavy torch, use on outdoor table top. Lots of options for use. Nice poles. Good product.
customer_reviews.author: MALCOLM SCOTT

customer_reviews.title: Great quality torches
customer_reviews.text: These things are great. Good quality and sturdy screw on poles
customer_reviews.author: william burger

customer_reviews.title: picture of 2 misleading
customer_reviews.text: received our one (1) tiki torch and it is fine but there are 2 in the picture and that is what we expected. Disappointed with the advertising.
customer_reviews.author: Madam Mim

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Great value!!! Well made, easy to assemble, very attractive and deck clips included
customer_reviews.author: lorraine smith

customer_reviews.title: Great Tiki Torch!
customer_reviews.text: Love this torch! Great stone color and very easy to put together. The versatility is nice, too. I can adjust the height as needed.
customer_reviews.author: JulieBanks85

customer_reviews.title: One Star
customer_reviews.text: Made of garbage didn't last one month completely rusted through!!
customer_reviews.author: Michael W.

customer_reviews.title: 1 ok, 1 broken
customer_reviews.text: One showed up broken. Took so long to get here, not worth sending it back to get a replacement. Will just glue it back together.
customer_reviews.author: Todd

customer_reviews.title: Four Stars
customer_reviews.text: A couple of small cracks on the side of one of the torches but still functions ok !
customer_reviews.author: Linda

customer_reviews.title: Multiple options to fit needs
customer_reviews.text: These are the most universal tiki torches I've seen. Love the look and was able to coordinate different assembly options to make the deck/landscape look awesome.
customer_reviews.author: Lana Garvelink

customer_reviews.title: Nice Torches
customer_reviews.text: So far so good. Not sure why the pointed tips for ground mounting pole are not included. Pole are, but end pieces are not. You have to buy them separately as an accessory. Seems kind of dumb but the torches a very nice.. Otherwise 5 stars.
customer_reviews.author: LDOLeary3

customer_reviews.title: Great lighting for patio
customer_reviews.text: My husband loves these on our back deck! They are perfect and love that you can use them at so many different heights...from on a stick in the garden to burning on a table. Great purchase
customer_reviews.author: Krissa Cramer

customer_reviews.title: I ordered four of these. Three of them were ...
customer_reviews.text: I ordered four of these. Three of them were the 4 in one. The fourth was a 3-in-1. Will not return, but thought that was not right.
customer_reviews.author: Patty Kesselheim

customer_reviews.title: Be weary of damage of finish upon shipping
customer_reviews.text: Was so excited to get these torches! Would have given 5 stars however they were damaged because of the way they were packaged for shipment. The outside box was in tact but no buffer inside between them and the box, so they are all scraped up. See the pictures. Good flame and I like the different options however they look cheap due to the marks.
customer_reviews.author: Jennifer D.

product_meta.title: TIKI Brand 63-inch Resin Jar TIKI Torch 4-in-1 Stone Color
product_meta.description: Color:StoneCreate a Paradise in Your Backyard with TIKI Brand torches. Natural flame outdoor torches help set the mood and add fun, décor and ambiance to your backyard or patio. Multi-use torches allow the flexibility to be used as full torches, garden lighting, deck or table top lighting. The torch can be used with TIKI Brand Citronella Torch Fuel or TIKI Brand BiteFighter Torch Fuel for proven mosquito repellency (each sold separately).
feature_bullets: MULTIPURPOSE TORCH: These torches can convert from full- to mid-sized garden torches or can be mounted to your deck using the included clamp. Remove the poles completely for beautiful table torches.

VERSATILE & LONG LASTING: This torch features a multi-piece pole that enables you to set the height you prefer, to a maximum of 64 inches tall. They can burn for up to five hours on each 12-ounce fill
PERSONAL PARADISE: We can help you create an outdoor paradise with our easy-to-use, long lasting TIKI products, designed in a wide variety of styles to suit any yard, garden, lawn, patio, or porch
STYLISH INNOVATION: We continue to innovate outdoor lighting with stylish designs & products like our mosquito repellent torch fuels, adjustable flame Table Torches & Citronella candle buckets
BEST OF THE BACKYARD: For over 60 years we've made outdoor torches to illuminate your yard or garden along with candles, wicks, stakes, stands, torch fuel & other accessories to light your landscape

specifications.Domestic Shipping: Item can be shipped within U.S.
specifications.International Shipping: This item can be shipped to select countries outside of the U.S. Learn More
